AboutMe-Subtitle: Or did you receive my resume without asking for it?
AboutMe-Line1: A team player who adapts quickly?
AboutMe-Line2: Who already knows Agile and source management?
AboutMe-Line3: Who is more or less able to explain technical concepts in an understandable way?
AboutMe-Line4: Who is eager to learn and enjoys reading books like Clean Code?
AboutMe-Line6: Who is enrolled full-time in a recognized educational institution and must complete a compulsory third-cycle internship of at least 140 hours???
